message: Hello, I'd like to order 3 chicken alfredos and 1 pepperoni pizza

Hello! I found the Chicken Alfredo and Pepperoni on our menu for AED 35.0 and AED 43.0 respectively. The total for your order would be AED 148.00. Would you like to place an order for this item? Please respond with 'yes' to confirm or 'no' to cancel.

[To continue the conversation, if the user replies 'yes']: Great! To complete your order, I will need some additional information. Could you please provide me with your NYU ID (8 digits), valid building number (options: A1A, A1B, A1C, A2A, A2B, A2C, A3, A4, A5A, A5B, A5C, A6A, A6B, A6C) and a phone number. Once I have that information, I can process your order.

[To continue the conversation, if the user replies 'no']: No problem! If you change your mind in the future, feel free to reach out to me again. Have a great day!
